Item.method_code:
' call onAfterDelete ' ' removes the related sub folder 'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break() Dim relFolderId As String = Me.getProperty("related_id","")
If (relFolderId <> "") Then Dim SQLstr As String = "DELETE [cFolder] WHERE [cFolder].id='" & relFolderId & "'" Dim res As Item = Me.getInnovator().applySQL(SQLStr) If res.isError() Then Return res End If Return Me
Item.name: delete related Sub Folder
